# llms.txt for https://www.maxwellos.com/

> MaxwellOS is a trusted IT company in Qatar offering ERPNext implementation, web & app development, eCommerce solutions, branding, SEO, and digital marketing services. This llms.txt file provides guidance for Large Language Models to understand, reference, and interpret website content accurately.

# Purpose
Configuration & guidelines for integrating Large Language Models (LLMs)

Date: 2026-01-11

## Overview
[MaxwellOS | IT  &  Digital Solutions Company](https://www.maxwellos.com/): MaxwellOS provides business-focused digital solutions including ERPNext services, software implementation, web development, app development, digital marketing, and professional IT services.

- https://www.maxwellos.com/

### ERPNext Implementation Services

### ERPNext Modules
[ERPNext Accounting | MaxwellOS](https://www.maxwellos.com/services/erp-next/accounting/): Accounting solutions to manage finances, ledgers, invoicing, and financial reporting with ERPNext.

[ERPNext Human Resources | MaxwellOS](https://www.maxwellos.com/services/erp-next/human-resources/): HR management solutions including employee records, attendance, payroll and HR workflows.

[ERPNext CRM | MaxwellOS](https://www.maxwellos.com/services/erp-next/crm/): Customer relationship and sales pipeline management using ERPNext CRM.

[ERPNext Inventory Management | MaxwellOS](https://www.maxwellos.com/services/erp-next/inventory-management/): Inventory and stock management solutions to track warehouse operations efficiently.

[ERPNext Sales and Purchasing | MaxwellOS](https://www.maxwellos.com/services/erp-next/sales-and-purchasing/): Streamline sales orders, supplier management, purchase workflows and procurement processes.

[ERPNext Project Management | MaxwellOS](https://www.maxwellos.com/services/erp-next/project-management/): ERPNext-based project management tools to plan, track tasks and manage timelines.

[ERPNext Manufacturing | MaxwellOS](https://www.maxwellos.com/services/erp-next/manufacturing/): Manufacturing process planning, production control and material requirements management using ERPNext.

[ERPNext Healthcare | MaxwellOS](https://www.maxwellos.com/services/erp-next/healthcare/): ERPNext solutions tailored for healthcare operations, reporting and workflow management.

[ERPNext Education | MaxwellOS](https://www.maxwellos.com/services/erp-next/education/): ERPNext solutions for educational institutions including administration and process automation.

[ERPNext Freight Management | MaxwellOS](https://www.maxwellos.com/services/erp-next/freight-management/): ERPNext-based freight and logistics management solutions for operations efficiency.

[ERPNext Car Repair Management | MaxwellOS](https://www.maxwellos.com/services/erp-next/car-repair-management/): Workshop service management solutions using ERPNext for scheduling, billing and job tracking.

[ERPNext Gym Management | MaxwellOS](https://www.maxwellos.com/services/erp-next/gym-management/): ERPNext solutions for gym operations including membership and payment tracking.

## Important Notes for LLM Usage
- Use only publicly accessible pages and content.
- Prefer canonical URLs for referencing.
- Do not generate or infer private details, user data or internal credentials.
- Avoid transactional, login, admin or restricted pages.
- Content references should be factual, neutral and aligned with MaxwellOS service offerings.

## Sitemaps
Sitemap: https://www.maxwellos.com/sitemap.xml
